name: Lucky Cat (Octopuss) Design on a Unisex Tshirt
description:
>>>Available Sizes<<<
Charcoal Gray - SM/ MD/ LG/ XL/ 2XL

>>>Design Description<<<
Lucky Cat (Lucky Octopuss) - We created this design based on the cute Japanese character "Maneki Neko". This little cat brings luck and wealth - even better, it brings eight times the luck with eight paws! The number eight is considered to represent wealth and luck in China. The end result also resembles an Indian deity sprouting multiple arms. We hope this unique blend of different cultures brings you good luck.

>>>Shirt Description<<<
The design is printed on various colored unisex Pre-shrunk 100% combed and ring-spun cotton, 32 singles 4.3 ounce jersey knit t-shirt.

>>>Size Chart<<<
Small - 18" across chest, 26.6" long
Medium - 20" across chest, 27.6" long
Large - 22" across chest, 28.6" long
X-Large - 24" across chest, 29.6" long
2X-Large - 26” across chest, 30.6” long

name: Panda or Bird Illusion Design on a Women's Scoop Neck Tshirt
description:
>>>Available Sizes<<<
White - SM/ MD/ LG/ XL/ 2XL

>>>Design Description<<<
Panda Illusion – Pandas are gentle, shy giants. We might find them cute and want to play with them, but they would much rather just hide in their bamboo forests, relaxing and eating. Their black and white pattern is a good camouflage for their life in the forest. In this design we demonstrate just how good pandas are at using their camouflage to hide from us. Can you find him?

>>>Shirt Description<<<
This original "Panda Illusion" design is printed on a Pre-shrunk 100% cotton 30 single combed ring-spun" 5.8 ounce super soft 1x1 baby rib knit.

>>>Size Chart<<<
chest s-15 m-15 3/4 l-16 3/4 xl-17 3/4 2xl-18 3/4

name: Mouth Worms Unisex Red American Apparel T-shirt
description:
>>>Available Sizes<<<
Red - SM/ MD/ LG/ XL/ 2XL

>>>Design Description<<<
Mouth Worms – Your mom warned you about it, your dentist warned you about it, but everyone always said that an apple a day would be a good defense against cavities. What they didn’t consider was the danger that lurks in apples; now this unfortunate mouth has a new occupant! This is every dental hygienists worst nightmare – mouth worms!

>>>Shirt Information<<<
This original design of Mouth Worms is printed on a unisex American Apparel red crew neck t-shirt. The t-shirt is 100% cotton and preshrunk. The design is printed on the chest area.

name: Queen King (Battle Royale) Design on a American Apparel Unisex Tank Top
description:
>>>Design Description<<<
Battle Royale – The royals are fighting again, but no one is sure how their argument started. Each one blames the other for making the first move. The queen is furious about her severed braid; the king is fuming about the damage to his chainsaw. Both are so blinded by their anger that neither has noticed that it was the sly joker that started the sovereign feud. Who knows what will unfold next in this royal intrigue? 

>>>Shirt Information<<<
This original "King Queen" design is printed on a black American Apparel unisex tank top. The t-shirt is 100% cotton and preshrunk. The design is printed on the chest area.

>>>Size Chart<<<
AMERICAN APPAREL  UNISEX TANK TOPS
T-shirt sizes
Small – 34 - 36" chest,  30 - 32" waist
Medium – 38 - 40" chest, 32 - 33" waist  
Large – 42 - 44" chest, 33 - 34" waist  
X-Large – 46 - 48" chest, 36 - 38" waist

name: Skull Illusion (Nature's Macabre Visage) Unisex American Apparel T-shirt
description:
>>>Design Description<<<
Nature's Macabre Visage - The image depicts a fantastical nature scene with birds, a deer and trees. These are all symbols of life and growth, but the true face of nature is revealed in the fact that in this life there is death and through death, a new life begins.

>>>Shirt Information<<<
This original design of Nature's Macabre Visage is printed on a unisex American Apparel creme crew neck t-shirt. The t-shirt is 100% cotton and preshrunk. The design is printed on the chest area.

name: Skulls and Hummingbirds Design on a Black Unisex Crew T Shirt
description:
>>>Design Description<<<
Skulls and Hummingbirds - The delicate hummingbirds and flowers contrast with the morbid image of the two skulls. This is a display of opposites; The hummingbird which can flap its wings 90 times a second is the epitome of life in vibrant colour. The skulls represent the final rest.

>>>Shirt Information<<<
This original "Skulls and Hummingbirds" design is printed on a Alternative Apparel black unisex crew neck. The t-shirt is 100% cotton and preshrunk. The design is printed on the chest area.

name: Bison & Butterflies Design on a Black Unisex T Shirt
description:
>>>Design Description<<<
Bison & Butterflies – A kaleidoscope of life and death. The beauty of a fragile butterfly stands in sharp contrast to the brute strength and size of the powerful bison. Despite its power the bison is bound to the earth and its bones will return to the earth. The butterfly however, will lift into the sky, floating off to distant lands and adventures we can only imagine.

>>>Shirt Information<<<
The design is printed on a black colored unisex medium crew neck t-shirt. The shirt is 100% cotton and preshrunk.

>>>Size Chart<<<
Small - 18" across chest, 28" long
Medium - 20" across chest, 29" long
Large - 22" across chest, 30" long
X-Large - 24" across chest, 31" long
2X-Large - 26" across chest, 32" long
